---
title: External Sources
---

Here are some good outside sources for finding datasets suitable for classes:

- [Data is Plural](https://www.data-is-plural.com/), a weekly newsletter of
  interesting public datasets.
- [Stanford Large Network Dataset Collection](https://snap.stanford.edu/data/)
- [Royal Society Open Science](https://royalsocietypublishing.org/journal/rsos),
  an open-access general science journal whose papers have Data Availability
  statements and often have public data
- [Scientific Data](https://www.nature.com/sdata/), a journal publishing
  descriptions of open datasets (often large and with unusual structure)
- [Open Case Studies](https://www.opencasestudies.org/), a collection of data
  analysis case studies showing analyses from conception to conclusion
